trendingmenu-desc: Shows most popular pages on the wiki.
trendingmenu-shortdesc: Shows most popular pages on the wiki.
wikilist: List of Wikis on the Liquipedia
action-see-wikilist: see and re-order list of Wikis on Liquipedia
wikilist-slug-help: Slug should be all lower case with zero spaces. If not provided, would be taken as Wiki name in all lower case with spaces removed. E.g. If the wiki name is 'My New Wiki', its slug would be 'mynewwiki' by default.
wikilist-wiki-empty-error: Wiki name should not be empty
apihelp-wikilist-summary: API to get list/hotlist of Wikis on Liquipedia
apihelp-updatewikilist-summary: API to update the list of Wikis on Liquipedia. DON'T EXECUTE IT DIRECTLY, ONLY USE THE SPECIAL PAGE TO EXECUTE
updatewikilist-shortdesc: API to update the list of Wikis
wikilist-data: 'list' for list of Wikis, 'hot' for Hotlist
updatewikilist-example: Example call: (P.S. Does not have the data in proper json format)
updatewikilist-error-action-notallowed: This API is limited to Administrators only.
